dialogues.text: Hello there, young one. My name is Selwyn.
I have devoted my life to the studies of Water Magic. There are many mysteries surrounding the origins of magic in Myrinnia.
Come see me once you have learnt the other skills. I can help you master your first Ability.
If you'd like, I can get you started with Water Magic.
Alright. I can teach you your first ability based on your choice of first weapon.
[You learnt {AbilityName} ability]
Abilities can only be used together with weapons that match the ability's combat style.
You must first drag this ability in your active slots. You can find it under '{CombatStyle}' and 'Water' in the Ability Overview.
Now to use an ability, you can either press the corresponding key or click it. Some abilities can be cast instantly, some require you to aim.
You may find Ability Masters across Myrinnia who can teach you all sorts of abilities. You can purchase these with Ability Points. You gain 1 point per combat level-up.
Another way of obtaining points is by doing quests or exploration. Finally, you may also learn new abilities from quests or exploration.
Well then, are you ready to learn your second ability?

options.text: I got it. Please tell me how to learn my second ability!

dialogues.text: Alright, you will have to do some exploration for this one and learn naturally.
North of here you will find Mt. Azure, an ancient mountain. It is said that it was created by Terra, the Spirit of Earth and Seyla, the Spirit of Water.
Terra is responsible for the creation of most land mass and wildlife in Myrinnia. Seyla is responsible for most oceans, rivers and lakes in Myrinnia.
Since both Spirits were involved in its creation, Mt. Azure possesses some magical properties. Being exposed to this magic, might fill your mind with new knowledge.
Therefore, if you wish to learn your second ability, you should reach the top of Mt. Azure and drink some water from the source.
Welcome back, adventurer. I sense something different about you. You managed to ascend Mt. Azure.
Congratulations. You should be ready to explore the world of Myrinnia now. If you want to explore the island more, feel free to do so.
You may want to speak to Captain Isaac, on the southern docks, if you wish to leave Azureal Island.
